00055 typedef struct EdgeFaceRef {
00056     int f1; /* init as -1 */
00057     int f2;
00058 } EdgeFaceRef;
00059 
00060 static void dm_calc_normal(DerivedMesh *dm, float (*temp_nors)[3])
00061 {
00062     int i, numVerts, numEdges, numFaces;
00063     MPoly *mpoly, *mp;
00064     MLoop *mloop, *ml;
00065     MVert *mvert, *mv;
00066 
00067     float (*face_nors)[3];
00068     float *f_no;
00069     int calc_face_nors= 0;
00070 
00071     numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00072     numEdges = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00073     numFaces = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00074     mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00075     mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00076     mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00077     
00078     /* we don't want to overwrite any referenced layers */
00079 
00080     /* Doesn't work here! */
00081 #if 0
00082     mv = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, numVerts);
00083     cddm->mvert = mv;
00084 #endif
00085 
00086     face_nors = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL);
00087     if (!face_nors) {
00088         calc_face_nors = 1;
00089         face_nors = CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numFaces);
00090     }
00091 
00092     mv = mvert;
00093     mp = mpoly;
00094 
00095     {
00096         EdgeHash *edge_hash = BLI_edgehash_new();
00097         EdgeHashIterator *edge_iter;
00098         int edge_ref_count = 0;
00099         unsigned int ed_v1, ed_v2; /* use when getting the key */
00100         EdgeFaceRef *edge_ref_array = MEM_callocN(numEdges * sizeof(EdgeFaceRef), "Edge Connectivity");
00101         EdgeFaceRef *edge_ref;
00102         float edge_normal[3];
00103 
00104         /* This function adds an edge hash if its not there, and adds the face index */
00105 #define NOCALC_EDGEWEIGHT_ADD_EDGEREF_FACE(EDV1, EDV2); \
00106             { \
00107                 const unsigned int ml_v1 = EDV1; \
00108                 const unsigned int ml_v2 = EDV2; \
00109                 edge_ref = (EdgeFaceRef *)BLI_edgehash_lookup(edge_hash, ml_v1, ml_v2); \
00110                 if (!edge_ref) { \
00111                     edge_ref = &edge_ref_array[edge_ref_count]; edge_ref_count++; \
00112                     edge_ref->f1 = i; \
00113                     edge_ref->f2 =- 1; \
00114                     BLI_edgehash_insert(edge_hash, ml_v1, ml_v2, edge_ref); \
00115                 } \
00116                 else { \
00117                     edge_ref->f2 = i; \
00118                 } \
00119             }
00120         /* --- end define --- */
00121 
00122         for (i = 0; i < numFaces; i++, mp++) {
00123             int j;
00124             
00125             f_no = face_nors[i];
00126             if (calc_face_nors)
00127                 mesh_calc_poly_normal(mp, mloop+mp->loopstart, mvert, f_no);
00128 
00129             ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00130             for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00131                 NOCALC_EDGEWEIGHT_ADD_EDGEREF_FACE(ml->v, ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(mloop, mp, j)->v);
00132             }
00133         }
00134 
00135         for (edge_iter = BLI_edgehashIterator_new(edge_hash); !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(edge_iter); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(edge_iter)) {
00136             /* Get the edge vert indices, and edge value (the face indices that use it)*/
00137             BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(edge_iter, &ed_v1, &ed_v2);
00138             edge_ref = BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(edge_iter);
00139 
00140             if (edge_ref->f2 != -1) {
00141                 /* We have 2 faces using this edge, calculate the edges normal
00142                  * using the angle between the 2 faces as a weighting */
00143                 add_v3_v3v3(edge_normal, face_nors[edge_ref->f1], face_nors[edge_ref->f2]);
00144                 normalize_v3(edge_normal);
00145                 mul_v3_fl(edge_normal, angle_normalized_v3v3(face_nors[edge_ref->f1], face_nors[edge_ref->f2]));
00146             }
00147             else {
00148                 /* only one face attached to that edge */
00149                 /* an edge without another attached- the weight on this is
00150                  * undefined, M_PI/2 is 90d in radians and that seems good enough */
00151                 mul_v3_v3fl(edge_normal, face_nors[edge_ref->f1], M_PI/2);
00152             }
00153             add_v3_v3(temp_nors[ed_v1], edge_normal);
00154             add_v3_v3(temp_nors[ed_v2], edge_normal);
00155         }
00156         BLI_edgehashIterator_free(edge_iter);
00157         BLI_edgehash_free(edge_hash, NULL);
00158         MEM_freeN(edge_ref_array);
00159     }
00160 
00161     /* normalize vertex normals and assign */
00162     for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00163         if (normalize_v3(temp_nors[i]) == 0.0f) {
00164             normal_short_to_float_v3(temp_nors[i], mv->no);
00165         }
00166     }
00167 }
00168  
00169 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00170 {
00171     SolidifyModifierData *smd = (SolidifyModifierData*) md;
00172     smd->offset = 0.01f;
00173     smd->offset_fac = -1.0f;
00174     smd->flag = MOD_SOLIDIFY_RIM;
00175 }
00176  
00177 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00178 {
00179     SolidifyModifierData *smd = (SolidifyModifierData*) md;
00180     SolidifyModifierData *tsmd = (SolidifyModifierData*) target;
00181     tsmd->offset = smd->offset;
00182     tsmd->offset_fac = smd->offset_fac;
00183     tsmd->crease_inner = smd->crease_inner;
00184     tsmd->crease_outer = smd->crease_outer;
00185     tsmd->crease_rim = smd->crease_rim;
00186     tsmd->flag = smd->flag;
00187     BLI_strncpy(tsmd->defgrp_name, smd->defgrp_name, sizeof(tsmd->defgrp_name));
00188 }
00189 
00190 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00191 {
00192     SolidifyModifierData *smd = (SolidifyModifierData*) md;
00193     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00194 
00195     /* ask for vertexgroups if we need them */
00196     if (smd->defgrp_name[0]) dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00197 
00198     return dataMask;
00199 }

00202 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, 
00203                         DerivedMesh *dm,
00204                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00205                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00206 {
00207     int i;
00208     DerivedMesh *result;
00209     const SolidifyModifierData *smd = (SolidifyModifierData*) md;
00210 
00211     MVert *mv, *mvert, *orig_mvert;
00212     MEdge *ed, *medge, *orig_medge;
00213     MLoop *ml, *mloop, *orig_mloop;
00214     MPoly *mp, *mpoly, *orig_mpoly;
00215     const int numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00216     const int numEdges = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00217     const int numFaces = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00218     int numLoops=0, newLoops=0, newFaces=0, newEdges=0;
00219     int j;
00220     
00221     /* only use material offsets if we have 2 or more materials  */
00222     const short mat_nr_max= ob->totcol > 1 ? ob->totcol - 1 : 0;
00223     const short mat_ofs= mat_nr_max ? smd->mat_ofs : 0;
00224     const short mat_ofs_rim= mat_nr_max ? smd->mat_ofs_rim : 0;
00225 
00226     /* use for edges */
00227     int *new_vert_arr= NULL;
00228     BLI_array_declare(new_vert_arr);
00229     int *new_edge_arr= NULL;
00230     BLI_array_declare(new_edge_arr);
00231     int *old_vert_arr = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*numVerts, "old_vert_arr in solidify");
00232 
00233     int *edge_users= NULL;
00234     char *edge_order= NULL;
00235     int *edge_origIndex;
00236     
00237     float (*vert_nors)[3]= NULL;
00238 
00239     float (*face_nors_result)[3] = NULL;
00240 
00241     const float ofs_orig=               - (((-smd->offset_fac + 1.0f) * 0.5f) * smd->offset);
00242     const float ofs_new= smd->offset    - (((-smd->offset_fac + 1.0f) * 0.5f) * smd->offset);
00243     const float offset_fac_vg= smd->offset_fac_vg;
00244     const float offset_fac_vg_inv= 1.0f - smd->offset_fac_vg;
00245 
00246     /* weights */
00247     MDeformVert *dvert, *dv= NULL;
00248     const int defgrp_invert = ((smd->flag & MOD_SOLIDIFY_VGROUP_INV) != 0);
00249     int defgrp_index;
00250 
00251     modifier_get_vgroup(ob, dm, smd->defgrp_name, &dvert, &defgrp_index);
00252 
00253     numLoops = dm->numLoopData;
00254     newLoops = 0;
00255     
00256     orig_mvert = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00257     orig_medge = dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
00258     orig_mloop = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00259     orig_mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00260 
00261     if (smd->flag & MOD_SOLIDIFY_RIM) {
00262         EdgeHash *edgehash = BLI_edgehash_new();
00263         EdgeHashIterator *ehi;
00264         unsigned int v1, v2;
00265         int eidx;
00266 
00267         for (i=0, mv=orig_mvert; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00268             mv->flag &= ~ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00269         }
00270 
00271         for (i=0, ed=orig_medge; i<numEdges; i++, ed++) {
00272             BLI_edgehash_insert(edgehash, ed->v1, ed->v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00273         }
00274 
00275 #define INVALID_UNUSED -1
00276 #define INVALID_PAIR -2
00277 
00278 #define ADD_EDGE_USER(_v1, _v2, edge_ord) \
00279         { \
00280             const unsigned int ml_v1 = _v1; \
00281             const unsigned int ml_v2 = _v2; \
00282             eidx= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(edgehash, ml_v1, ml_v2)); \
00283             if (edge_users[eidx] == INVALID_UNUSED) { \
00284                 ed= orig_medge + eidx; \
00285                 edge_users[eidx] = (ml_v1 < ml_v2) == (ed->v1 < ed->v2) ? i : (i + numFaces); \
00286                 edge_order[eidx] = edge_ord; \
00287             } \
00288             else { \
00289                 edge_users[eidx] = INVALID_PAIR; \
00290             } \
00291         }
00292 
00293 
00294         edge_users= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numEdges, "solid_mod edges");
00295         edge_order= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(char) * numEdges, "solid_mod eorder");
00296         fill_vn_i(edge_users, numEdges, INVALID_UNUSED);
00297         
00298         for (i=0, mp=orig_mpoly; i<numFaces; i++, mp++) {
00299             MLoop *ml;
00300             
00301             for (ml=orig_mloop + mp->loopstart, j=0; j<mp->totloop; ml++, j++) {
00302                 ADD_EDGE_USER(ml->v, ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(orig_mloop, mp, j)->v, j);
00303             }   
00304         }
00305 
00306 #undef ADD_EDGE_USER
00307 #undef INVALID_UNUSED
00308 #undef INVALID_PAIR
00309 
00310         ehi= BLI_edgehashIterator_new(edgehash);
00311         for (; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi); BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi)) {
00312             eidx= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(ehi));
00313             if (edge_users[eidx] >= 0) {
00314                 BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(ehi, &v1, &v2);
00315                 orig_mvert[v1].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00316                 orig_mvert[v2].flag |= ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00317                 BLI_array_append(new_edge_arr, eidx);
00318                 newFaces++;
00319                 newLoops += 4;
00320             }
00321         }
00322         BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
00323 
00324         for (i=0, mv=orig_mvert; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00325             if (mv->flag & ME_VERT_TMP_TAG) {
00326                 old_vert_arr[i] = BLI_array_count(new_vert_arr);
00327                 BLI_array_append(new_vert_arr, i);
00328                 newEdges++;
00329 
00330                 mv->flag &= ~ME_VERT_TMP_TAG;
00331             }
00332         }
00333 
00334         BLI_edgehash_free(edgehash, NULL);
00335     }
00336 
00337     if (smd->flag & MOD_SOLIDIFY_NORMAL_CALC) {
00338         vert_nors= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * numVerts * 3, "mod_solid_vno_hq");
00339         dm_calc_normal(dm, vert_nors);
00340     }
00341 
00342     result = CDDM_from_template(dm, numVerts * 2, (numEdges * 2) + newEdges, 0, (numLoops*2) + newLoops, (numFaces * 2) + newFaces);
00343 
00344     mpoly = CDDM_get_polys(result);
00345     mloop = CDDM_get_loops(result);
00346     medge = CDDM_get_edges(result);
00347     mvert = CDDM_get_verts(result);
00348 
00349     DM_copy_edge_data(dm, result, 0, 0, numEdges);
00350     DM_copy_edge_data(dm, result, 0, numEdges, numEdges);
00351 
00352     DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, 0, 0, numVerts);
00353     DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, 0, numVerts, numVerts);
00354 
00355     DM_copy_loop_data(dm, result, 0, 0, numLoops);
00356     DM_copy_loop_data(dm, result, 0, numLoops, numLoops);
00357 
00358     DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, 0, 0, numFaces);
00359     DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, 0, numFaces, numFaces);
00360 
00361     /* if the original has it, get the result so we can update it */
00362     face_nors_result = CustomData_get_layer(&result->polyData, CD_NORMAL);
00363 
00364     /*flip normals*/
00365     mp = mpoly + numFaces;
00366     for (i=0; i<dm->numPolyData; i++, mp++) {
00367         MLoop *ml2;
00368         int e;
00369 
00370         ml2 = mloop + mp->loopstart + dm->numLoopData;
00371         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++) {
00372             CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &result->loopData, mp->loopstart+j, 
00373                                  mp->loopstart+(mp->totloop-j-1)+dm->numLoopData, 1);
00374         }
00375 
00376         if (mat_ofs) {
00377             mp->mat_nr += mat_ofs;
00378             CLAMP(mp->mat_nr, 0, mat_nr_max);
00379         }
00380 
00381         e = ml2[0].e;
00382         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop-1; j++) {
00383             ml2[j].e = ml2[j+1].e;
00384         }
00385         ml2[mp->totloop-1].e = e;
00386         
00387         mp->loopstart += dm->numLoopData;
00388         
00389         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++) {
00390             ml2[j].e += numEdges;
00391             ml2[j].v += numVerts;
00392         }
00393 
00394         if (face_nors_result) {
00395             negate_v3_v3(face_nors_result[numFaces + i], face_nors_result[i]);
00396         }
00397     }
00398 
00399     for (i=0, ed=medge+numEdges; i<numEdges; i++, ed++) {
00400         ed->v1 += numVerts;
00401         ed->v2 += numVerts;
00402     }
00403 
00404     /* note, copied vertex layers don't have flipped normals yet. do this after applying offset */
00405     if ((smd->flag & MOD_SOLIDIFY_EVEN) == 0) {
00406         /* no even thickness, very simple */
00407         float scalar_short;
00408         float scalar_short_vgroup;
00409 
00410 
00411         if (ofs_new != 0.0f) {
00412             scalar_short= scalar_short_vgroup= ofs_new / 32767.0f;
00413             mv= mvert + ((ofs_new >= ofs_orig) ? 0 : numVerts);
00414             dv= dvert;
00415             for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00416                 if (dv) {
00417                     if (defgrp_invert)  scalar_short_vgroup = 1.0f - defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00418                     else                scalar_short_vgroup = defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00419                     scalar_short_vgroup= (offset_fac_vg + (scalar_short_vgroup * offset_fac_vg_inv)) * scalar_short;
00420                     dv++;
00421                 }
00422                 VECADDFAC(mv->co, mv->co, mv->no, scalar_short_vgroup);
00423             }
00424         }
00425 
00426         if (ofs_orig != 0.0f) {
00427             scalar_short= scalar_short_vgroup= ofs_orig / 32767.0f;
00428             mv= mvert + ((ofs_new >= ofs_orig) ? numVerts : 0); /* same as above but swapped, intentional use of 'ofs_new' */
00429             dv= dvert;
00430             for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00431                 if (dv) {
00432                     if (defgrp_invert)  scalar_short_vgroup = 1.0f - defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00433                     else                scalar_short_vgroup = defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00434                     scalar_short_vgroup= (offset_fac_vg + (scalar_short_vgroup * offset_fac_vg_inv)) * scalar_short;
00435                     dv++;
00436                 }
00437                 VECADDFAC(mv->co, mv->co, mv->no, scalar_short_vgroup);
00438             }
00439         }
00440 
00441     }
00442     else {
00443         /* make a face normal layer if not present */
00444         float (*face_nors)[3];
00445         int face_nors_calc= 0;
00446 
00447         /* same as EM_solidify() in editmesh_lib.c */
00448         float *vert_angles= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * numVerts * 2, "mod_solid_pair"); /* 2 in 1 */
00449         float *vert_accum= vert_angles + numVerts;
00450         float *face_angles = NULL;
00451         BLI_array_staticdeclare(face_angles, 16); /* BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE */
00452         int j, vidx;
00453 
00454         face_nors = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL);
00455         if (!face_nors) {
00456             face_nors = CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dm->numPolyData);
00457             face_nors_calc= 1;
00458         }
00459 
00460         if (vert_nors==NULL) {
00461             vert_nors= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numVerts * 3, "mod_solid_vno");
00462             for (i=0, mv=mvert; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00463                 normal_short_to_float_v3(vert_nors[i], mv->no);
00464             }
00465         }
00466 
00467         for (i=0, mp=mpoly; i<numFaces; i++, mp++) {
00468             if (face_nors_calc)
00469                 mesh_calc_poly_normal(mp, &mloop[mp->loopstart], mvert, face_nors[i]);
00470             
00471             /* just added, calc the normal */
00472             BLI_array_empty(face_angles);
00473             for (j=0, ml=mloop+mp->loopstart; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00474                 MLoop *ml_prev = ME_POLY_LOOP_PREV(mloop, mp, j);
00475                 MLoop *ml_next = ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(mloop, mp, j);
00476 
00477                 float e1[3], e2[3], angle;
00478                 
00479                 sub_v3_v3v3(e1, mvert[ml_next->v].co, mvert[ml->v].co);
00480                 sub_v3_v3v3(e2, mvert[ml_prev->v].co, mvert[ml->v].co);
00481                 angle = M_PI - angle_normalized_v3v3(e1, e2);
00482                 BLI_array_append(face_angles, angle);
00483             }
00484             
00485             for (j=0, ml=mloop+mp->loopstart; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00486                 vidx = ml->v;
00487                 vert_accum[vidx] += face_angles[j];
00488                 vert_angles[vidx]+= shell_angle_to_dist(angle_normalized_v3v3(vert_nors[vidx], face_nors[i])) * face_angles[j];
00489             }
00490         }
00491     
00492         BLI_array_free(face_angles);
00493 
00494         /* vertex group support */
00495         if (dvert) {
00496             float scalar;
00497 
00498             dv= dvert;
00499             if (defgrp_invert) {
00500                 for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, dv++) {
00501                     scalar= 1.0f - defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00502                     scalar= offset_fac_vg + (scalar * offset_fac_vg_inv);
00503                     vert_angles[i] *= scalar;
00504                 }
00505             }
00506             else {
00507                 for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, dv++) {
00508                     scalar= defvert_find_weight(dv, defgrp_index);
00509                     scalar= offset_fac_vg + (scalar * offset_fac_vg_inv);
00510                     vert_angles[i] *= scalar;
00511                 }
00512             }
00513         }
00514 
00515         if (ofs_new) {
00516             mv= mvert + ((ofs_new >= ofs_orig) ? 0 : numVerts);
00517 
00518             for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00519                 if (vert_accum[i]) { /* zero if unselected */
00520                     madd_v3_v3fl(mv->co, vert_nors[i], ofs_new * (vert_angles[i] / vert_accum[i]));
00521                 }
00522             }
00523         }
00524 
00525         if (ofs_orig) {
00526             mv= mvert + ((ofs_new >= ofs_orig) ? numVerts : 0); /* same as above but swapped, intentional use of 'ofs_new' */
00527 
00528             for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00529                 if (vert_accum[i]) { /* zero if unselected */
00530                     madd_v3_v3fl(mv->co, vert_nors[i], ofs_orig * (vert_angles[i] / vert_accum[i]));
00531                 }
00532             }
00533         }
00534 
00535         MEM_freeN(vert_angles);
00536     }
00537 
00538     if (vert_nors)
00539         MEM_freeN(vert_nors);
00540 
00541     /* flip vertex normals for copied verts */
00542     mv= mvert + numVerts;
00543     for (i=0; i<numVerts; i++, mv++) {
00544         mv->no[0]= -mv->no[0];
00545         mv->no[1]= -mv->no[1];
00546         mv->no[2]= -mv->no[2];
00547     }
00548 
00549     if (smd->flag & MOD_SOLIDIFY_RIM) {
00550         int *origindex;
00551         
00552         /* bugger, need to re-calculate the normals for the new edge faces.
00553          * This could be done in many ways, but probably the quickest way is to calculate the average normals for side faces only.
00554          * Then blend them with the normals of the edge verts.
00555          * 
00556          * at the moment its easiest to allocate an entire array for every vertex, even though we only need edge verts - campbell
00557          */
00558         
00559 #define SOLIDIFY_SIDE_NORMALS
00560 
00561 #ifdef SOLIDIFY_SIDE_NORMALS
00562         /* annoying to allocate these since we only need the edge verts, */
00563         float (*edge_vert_nos)[3]= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * numVerts * 3, "solidify_edge_nos");
00564         float nor[3];
00565 #endif
00566         const unsigned char crease_rim= smd->crease_rim * 255.0f;
00567         const unsigned char crease_outer= smd->crease_outer * 255.0f;
00568         const unsigned char crease_inner= smd->crease_inner * 255.0f;
00569 
00570         /* add faces & edges */
00571         origindex= result->getEdgeDataArray(result, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00572         ed= medge + (numEdges * 2);
00573         for (i=0; i<newEdges; i++, ed++) {
00574             ed->v1= new_vert_arr[i];
00575             ed->v2= new_vert_arr[i] + numVerts;
00576             ed->flag |= ME_EDGEDRAW;
00577 
00578             origindex[numEdges * 2 + i]= ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00579 
00580             if (crease_rim)
00581                 ed->crease= crease_rim;
00582         }
00583 
00584         /* faces */
00585         edge_origIndex = origindex;
00586         origindex = DM_get_poly_data_layer(result, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00587         
00588         mp = mpoly + (numFaces * 2);
00589         ml = mloop + (numLoops * 2);
00590         j = 0;
00591         for (i=0; i<newFaces; i++, mp++) {
00592             int eidx= new_edge_arr[i];
00593             int fidx= edge_users[eidx];
00594             int flip, k1, k2;
00595 
00596             if (fidx >= numFaces) {
00597                 fidx -= numFaces;
00598                 flip= 1;
00599             }
00600             else {
00601                 flip= 0;
00602             }
00603 
00604             ed= medge + eidx;
00605 
00606             /* copy most of the face settings */
00607             DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, fidx, (numFaces * 2) + i, 1);
00608             mp->loopstart = j+numLoops*2;
00609             mp->flag = mpoly[fidx].flag;
00610 
00611             /* notice we use 'mp->totloop' which is later overwritten,
00612              * we could lookup the original face but theres no point since this is a copy
00613              * and will have the same value, just take care when changing order of assignment */
00614             k1 = mpoly[fidx].loopstart + ((edge_order[eidx] + 1) % mp->totloop);
00615             k2 = mpoly[fidx].loopstart +  (edge_order[eidx]);
00616 
00617             mp->totloop = 4;
00618 
00619             CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &result->loopData, k1, numLoops*2+j+0, 1);
00620             CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &result->loopData, k2, numLoops*2+j+1, 1);
00621             CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &result->loopData, k2, numLoops*2+j+2, 1);
00622             CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &result->loopData, k1, numLoops*2+j+3, 1);
00623 
00624             if (flip) {
00625                 ml[j].v = ed->v1;
00626                 ml[j++].e = eidx;
00627                 
00628                 ml[j].v = ed->v2;
00629                 ml[j++].e = numEdges*2 + old_vert_arr[ed->v2];
00630                 
00631                 ml[j].v = ed->v2+numVerts;
00632                 ml[j++].e = eidx+numEdges;
00633                 
00634                 ml[j].v = ed->v1+numVerts;
00635                 ml[j++].e = numEdges*2 + old_vert_arr[ed->v1];
00636             }
00637             else {
00638                 ml[j].v = ed->v2;
00639                 ml[j++].e = eidx;
00640 
00641                 ml[j].v = ed->v1;
00642                 ml[j++].e = numEdges*2 + old_vert_arr[ed->v1];
00643 
00644                 ml[j].v = ed->v1+numVerts;
00645                 ml[j++].e = eidx+numEdges;
00646 
00647                 ml[j].v = ed->v2+numVerts;
00648                 ml[j++].e = numEdges*2 + old_vert_arr[ed->v2];
00649             }
00650             
00651             if (edge_origIndex) {
00652                 edge_origIndex[ml[j-3].e] = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00653                 edge_origIndex[ml[j-1].e] = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
00654             }
00655 
00656             /* use the next material index if option enabled */
00657             if (mat_ofs_rim) {
00658                 mp->mat_nr += mat_ofs_rim;
00659                 CLAMP(mp->mat_nr, 0, mat_nr_max);
00660             }
00661             if (crease_outer) {
00662                 /* crease += crease_outer; without wrapping */
00663                 unsigned char *cr= (unsigned char *)&(ed->crease);
00664                 int tcr= *cr + crease_outer;
00665                 *cr= tcr > 255 ? 255 : tcr;
00666             }
00667 
00668             if (crease_inner) {
00669                 /* crease += crease_inner; without wrapping */
00670                 unsigned char *cr= (unsigned char *)&(medge[numEdges + eidx].crease);
00671                 int tcr= *cr + crease_inner;
00672                 *cr= tcr > 255 ? 255 : tcr;
00673             }
00674             
00675 #ifdef SOLIDIFY_SIDE_NORMALS
00676             normal_quad_v3(nor, mvert[ml[j-4].v].co, mvert[ml[j-3].v].co, mvert[ml[j-2].v].co, mvert[ml[j-1].v].co);
00677 
00678             add_v3_v3(edge_vert_nos[ed->v1], nor);
00679             add_v3_v3(edge_vert_nos[ed->v2], nor);
00680 
00681             if (face_nors_result) {
00682                 copy_v3_v3(face_nors_result[(numFaces * 2) + i], nor);
00683             }
00684 #endif
00685         }
00686         
00687 #ifdef SOLIDIFY_SIDE_NORMALS
00688         ed= medge + (numEdges * 2);
00689         for (i=0; i<newEdges; i++, ed++) {
00690             float nor_cpy[3];
00691             short *nor_short;
00692             int j;
00693             
00694             /* note, only the first vertex (lower half of the index) is calculated */
00695             normalize_v3_v3(nor_cpy, edge_vert_nos[ed->v1]);
00696             
00697             for (j=0; j<2; j++) { /* loop over both verts of the edge */
00698                 nor_short= mvert[*(&ed->v1 + j)].no;
00699                 normal_short_to_float_v3(nor, nor_short);
00700                 add_v3_v3(nor, nor_cpy);
00701                 normalize_v3(nor);
00702                 normal_float_to_short_v3(nor_short, nor);
00703             }
00704         }
00705 
00706         MEM_freeN(edge_vert_nos);
00707 #endif
00708 
00709         BLI_array_free(new_vert_arr);
00710         BLI_array_free(new_edge_arr);
00711         MEM_freeN(edge_users);
00712         MEM_freeN(edge_order);
00713     }
00714 
00715     if (old_vert_arr)
00716         MEM_freeN(old_vert_arr);
00717     
00718     /* must recalculate normals with vgroups since they can displace unevenly [#26888] */
00719     if (dvert) {
00720         CDDM_calc_normals(result);
00721     }
00722 
00723     return result;
00724 }
00725 
00726 #undef SOLIDIFY_SIDE_NORMALS
00727 
00728 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md,
00729                              Object *ob,
00730                              struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00731                              DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00732 {
00733     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00734 }
00735

00737 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Solidify = {
00738     /* name */              "Solidify",
00739     /* structName */        "SolidifyModifierData",
00740     /* structSize */        sizeof(SolidifyModifierData),
00741     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Constructive,
00742 
00743     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00744                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs
00745                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00746                             | eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00747                             | eModifierTypeFlag_EnableInEditmode,
00748 
00749     /* copyData */          copyData,
00750     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00751     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00752     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00753     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00754     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00755     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00756     /* initData */          initData,
00757     /* requiredDataMask */  requiredDataMask,
00758     /* freeData */          NULL,
00759     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00760     /* updateDepgraph */    NULL,
00761     /* dependsOnTime */     NULL,
00762     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00763     /* foreachObjectLink */ NULL,
00764     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00765     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00766 };
